title: Kosovo Demining Action - Clearance of mines and cluster munitions
description:
Through the implementation of the action, approximately 30% of the total remaining area suspected to be contaminated by Cluster Munition Remnants (CMR) and 30% of the total remaining area suspected to be contaminated by landmines will be released and cleared.

The intervention has an expected impact of improving the protection of civilians, as a contribution to public safety and the social economic development of the communities living in the contaminated area.
